title: Bukiyip (1976) Genesis Portion (Mak Jesesis)
description: Bukiyip translation of a portion of Genesis published in 1976 by Wycliffe Bible Translators. Bukiyip, or Mountain Arapesh, is an Arapesh language spoken by around 16,000 people between Yangoru and Maprik in the East Sepik Province of Papua New Guinea.

language.name: Bukiyip
language.area: East Sepik Province, west Yangoru District, Torricelli Mountains.
